name: Adventure Game Demo (Ze_PilOt)
description:
A 5 minutes game demo replicating Disco Elysium dialog system.

You can switch the language with the menu (esc or the button on the bottom left).

Dialogs & translation : chatGPT
Voice acting : replica studios &speechgen.io
Visuals : myself with the help of Stable Diffusion + Control net


Music : Long Note Three - Kevin MacLeod
